item.title: Travelgatex: Uploading Strategies
item.description:
How to upload data to the platform There are two ways of uploading data to the platform: Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP) GraphQL mutation We recommend continuing to use SFTP at present while we build out more GraphQL resources. While you can make your updates via a mutation, we have not yet written up resources to show you how to do that. If you require these resources immediately, please contact us via Slack, Jira or by raising an issue in GitHub.
[...]
